meanings.definition: A person who engages in the act of gammoning.
meanings.sent1: The gammoner enjoyed tricking his friends during board games.
meanings.sent2: The gammoner was known for his clever strategies in gammoning.
meanings.sent3: The gammoner's tricks always brought laughter to the group.
meanings.sent4: She was a gammoner, weaving tales that deceived even the most skeptical.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous gammoner made the game more exciting with his deceptions.

meanings.sent4: His words gammoned her into believing his false promises.
meanings.sent5: The spy gammoned the enemy by feeding them false information.
